settings.custom_html: Confidential Couture takes pride in developing a more transparent selling process for its customers. We believe that selling your luxury products should be hassle free, simple and fair. By this new policy, we aim for our sellers to have the maximum gain after selling their product.

settings.custom_html:
Parting ways with your luxury should not pinch your pocket rather get you a return on the investment you made wisely in the past. YES, now you can buy a new home for your preloved authentic luxury products and earn while doing so because why not?

You can now choose to CONSIGN, LIST, SWAP or GET PAID INSTANTLY with us to sell your luxury items and earn

custom_css: .container-ay {display: flex; gap: 20px; justify-content: center;}

.box-ay {background-color: yellow; text-align: center; background: #ffea00; padding: 15px 15px 20px; font-size: 16px !important; font-weight: 400 !important; font-family: Jost, sans-serif; line-height: 1.71428571;}
.box-ay h2 {margin-top: 0; line-height: 1; font-size: 1.8rem; font-family: Amiri, sans-serif !important; margin-bottom: 20px;}
.box-ay ul {list-style-type: none; padding: 0;}
.box-ay ul li {padding: 5px 0; color: #666666;}

settings.custom_html:
CONSIGN IT

  • Product remains with CC until sold.
  • Lower risk to sell, higher return.

LIST IT

  • Part ways with your item once its sold.
  • Higher risk to sell, lower return.

SWAP IT

  • Give us your old item and take home an item from us.
  • Items eligible depend on current market trends.
  • No risk, lower return.

INSTANT PAYOUT

  • Get an upfront offer for your product.
  • Items eligible depend on current market trends.
  • No risk, lower return.

.bttn-ay:hover {background: black; color: white;}

settings.custom_html:
HOW CAN YOU SELL YOUR LUXURY FASHION?

WHATSAPP QUOTE

Share images and receive a
quotation within 24 hours

SUBMIT ONLINE

Submit your product details on the website to receive a quotation

APPROVE

A price range is suggested to let you decide the final payout.

REJECT

In this case, a revised quote is shared or the product is returned immediately

PICK UP

We will arrange a free pick up once the quotations are approved.

SHIP IT

You can ship the items you wish to sell to us.

VISIT OUR STORE

Drop your items at the store.

PRODUCT SPA

Cleaning, restoring, dry cleaning and a hygine check is done.

PROFESSIONAL PHOTOSHOOT

Content creation to provide real information

ORGANIC & PAID PROMOTIONS

To ensure the product sells faster

CASH

Collect your payment in

BANK TRANSFER

cash Receive a bank transfer

CREDIT NOTE

Or get a credit note

settings.custom_html:
BRAND NEW WITH PACKAGING

Item is in New condition and includes one or more of the following: the original box, case, attached retailer tags. Example: An item gifted to the seller who immediately hands it over to us.

NEW

Item appears completely unused. May contain very faint signs of wear due to time & storage. Example: An purchase by the seller that has only made itsappearance in his/her wardrobe.

EXCELLENT

Item contains extremely little wear. Any flaws or signs of wear are not visible to the naked eye and are described in the listing. Example: A bag worn by the seller for say, one event after which it made its way to us

NEAT

Item shows some wear and signs of previous use, but still has a lot of life in it. Slightly worn corners, creases in leather, and tarnished hardware may be visible. Any notable flaws or signs of wear are described in the listing.

GOOD

Item does show moderate signs of prior use. Surface scratches, slight darkening in handles, imperfections in metallic hardware and other indications of wear may be visible. Such signs of wear or imperfections will be noted in the listing. Example: A bag that was worn 2-3 times a week for a few months

SATISFACTORY

Item will have noticeable signs of wear such as well scuffed edges or significant scratches. Please read the condition notes in the listing and inspect photos before purchasing. Fair condition items often present our customers with the greatest opportunity to save significantly on authentic luxury bags

PRODUCT HANDLING

SELLER CONFIDENTIALITY TRANSPARENT PRICING AND COMMISSIONS Our skilled experts handle products with great care and safety precautions are taken.

NETWORK OF BUYERS AND SELLERS

Product turnaround period reduces as a result of a strong network pan India for buying and selling

CC CONCIERGE

A reward program for when you have too many products to sell, quicker payments and incentives for sellers

TRANSPARENT PRICING AND COMMISSIONS

We follow the best industry practices for a well-researched and right price to ensure your items sell faster.

SELLER CONFIDENTIALITY

Seller information obtained is confidential, products listed are anonymous.

settings.custom_html:
HOW TO GET BACK YOUR PRODUCT?

Confidential Couture aims to make the process of returns hassle-free for its customers. As a seller, you can choose to return your item whether you are consigning it or listing it with us. Should you wish to cancel/amend/recall your product/s from Us, you need to contact us on support@confidentialcouture.com or +91 88266 69157 with the details. Our experts will then start the process of return!


PLEASE FIND THE SCHEDULE OF CHARGES AND TERMS

S.no CRITERIA CONSIGNMENT LISTING
1 Return after Contract period Shipping charges No charges
2 Premature termination of contract/Delisting INR 500+Shipping charges INR 500
3 Consignment/Listing cancellation before curation process INR 500/- INR 500/-
4 In-authentic product identify under curation process INR 2500/- INR 2500/-
5 Cancellation/return of product by buyer This is can either be in our stock or if you would like the item back, one-way Shipping charges will apply This is can either be in our stock or if you would like the item back, one-way Shipping charges will apply
6 Product recall after product being dispatched by us to the buyer INR 2500 or 5% of the transaction value (whichever is higher) + shipping charges per product INR 2500 or 5% of the transaction value (whichever is higher) + shipping charges per product

Terms:
  • Please note that return requests are time bound. If you have multiple items listed or consigned with us, a one-time fee is applicable. However, if you decide to keep the rest of the products listed with us, and return a few, return charges will be applicable should you wish you recall other products at a different time.
  • Please note that any restoration/reapair done to improve the condition category of your product/'s will be chargeable at return before or after the contract period is over.
  • Also, no returns will be accepted once the product is delivered to the buyer unless the buyer cancels the order themselves.
  • Confidential Couture does not take guarantee for the return of an item if your products are already on their way to the buyer as delivery and shipments are carried out by a third-party courier service. While you might have requested for a return, we cannot guarantee it.
